pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.3_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.5_2: thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheti na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.8_2: thullanandā bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhessati na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.10_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.11.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭheyya na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ kareyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.13_1: na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karissāmī”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.14_0: Antevāsiniṁ vā anupasampannaṁ vā neva upaṭṭheti,
